suncertify.client
Class DataView

java.lang.Object
  |

                                +--suncertify.client.DataView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, FlightsModelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class DataView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements FlightsModelListener

User interface indicates the main view of available flights and all functionality necessary for booking and searching of flights, throught by usage of controls, such as buttons and comboboxes. Also, there is a menu bar to possibiliy access a help on line.

Version:
1.2 03 Mar 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos
See Also:
Serialized Form
